mapper.sql: id,user_name as userName,project_code as projectCode, create_time as createTime ,commands ,result_info as resultInfo,profile
mapper.insert:
insert into t_g_maven_command_logs
id,
user_name,
project_code,
create_time,
commands,
result_info,
profile,

mapper.select:
select
from t_g_maven_command_logs order by id limit 100
